M10Robot:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
M10Robot:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Extract !M! cards. NL m10robot:Overclock the next !M! cards you play !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:AllIn.NAME: All In
M10Robot:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand X{!M!|>0= + !M!} times.

M10Robot:Analytics.NAME: Extrapolate
M10Robot:Analytics.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you m10robot:Extract a card, m10robot:Overclock it !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:Ascension.NAME: Ascension
M10Robot:Ascension.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M10Robot:SecondMagic! time{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:AssaultField.NAME: Assault Field
M10Robot:AssaultField.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle !M! *Assault{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile.

M10Robot:Assault.NAME: Assault
M10Robot:Assault.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
M10Robot:AssemblyLine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! m10robot:Presents. NL m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs !M10Robot:SecondMagic! time{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}{@@}.

M10Robot:AttackDown.NAME: Attack Down
M10Robot:AttackDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:DefenseDown.NAME: Defense Down
M10Robot:DefenseDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.NAME: Balance Currents
M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:BitMask.NAME: Bitmask
M10Robot:BitMask.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bit{!M!|>1=s} for each Attack played this turn.{!Location!|0= NL (Attacks played: !M10Robot:Info!)}

M10Robot:BoosterShot.NAME: Booster
M10Robot:BoosterShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL m10robot:Upgrade your next Orb !M! times.

M10Robot:Bramble.NAME: Bramble
M10Robot:Bramble.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes. NL Gain Block equal to your m10robot:Spikes.{!Location!|0= NL (Gains !M10Robot:Info! Block)}

M10Robot:Byte.NAME: Byte
M10Robot:Byte.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bits.
M10Robot:Byte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bits.

M10Robot:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
M10Robot:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.
M10Robot:Nibble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:Cloaking.NAME: Cloaking
M10Robot:Cloaking.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

M10Robot:Disable.NAME: Disable
M10Robot:Disable.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Weak.
M10Robot:Disable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Weak. NL Apply !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Vulnerable.

M10Robot:DividedAttention.NAME: Divided Attention
M10Robot:DividedAttention.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s} at random. m10robot:Extract !M! cards at random.

M10Robot:EMP.NAME: EMP
M10Robot:EMP.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.NAME: Empty Buffer
M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Remove all your Orbs. NL Gain !M! Orb slot{!M!|>1=s} for each Orb removed.
M10Robot:EmptyBuffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Evoke all your Orbs. NL Gain !M! Orb slot{!M!|>1=s} for each Orb Evoked.

M10Robot:EnergyShield.NAME: Energy Shield
M10Robot:EnergyShield.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL If you had no Block, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

M10Robot:Engage.NAME: Engage
M10Robot:Engage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Lock-On. NL If the enemy intends to attack, draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.
M10Robot:Engage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Lock-On. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:EvasionDown.NAME: Evasion Down
M10Robot:EvasionDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Enemy takes !M! additional damage from all sources this turn.

M10Robot:HealthDown.NAME: Health Down
M10Robot:HealthDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. NL If you have played *Evasion *Down this turn, repeat this effect.

M10Robot:Filter.NAME: Filter
M10Robot:Filter.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Extract !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Swap your draw and discard piles.

M10Robot:FullAuto.NAME: Inversion Beam
M10Robot:FullAuto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

M10Robot:HomeSweeper.NAME: Home Sweeper
M10Robot:HomeSweeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Deals !M! more damage per turn passed.

M10Robot:Juggling.NAME: Juggling
M10Robot:Juggling.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! additional card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:LightShow.NAME: Light Show
M10Robot:LightShow.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Searchlight{!M!|>1=s} for each Skill played this turn.{!Location!|0= NL (Skills played: !M10Robot:Info!)}

M10Robot:Overdrive.NAME: Overdrive Form
M10Robot:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL At the start of your turn, m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:PileDriver.NAME: Pile Driver
M10Robot:PileDriver.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Spiky. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random other enemy.

M10Robot:PowerSavings.NAME: Power Savings
M10Robot:PowerSavings.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! Weak. NL At the start of your turn, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} .

M10Robot:Prelude.NAME: Prelude
M10Robot:Prelude.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Overclock the next {!M!|@=card|>1=!M! cards} you play !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
M10Robot:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

M10Robot:QuickRepair.NAME: Quick Repair
M10Robot:QuickRepair.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When m10robot:Extracted, NL gain !B! Block.

M10Robot:Railgun.NAME: Railgun
M10Robot:Railgun.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Gold. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Lock-On, apply !M! Vulnerable.

M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.NAME: RAM Upgrade
M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Orb slot{!M!|>1=s}. NL Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it !M10Robot:SecondMagic! time{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:RapidAssembly.NAME: Rapid Assembly
M10Robot:RapidAssembly.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M! times.

M10Robot:RecoveryMode.NAME: Recovery Mode
M10Robot:RecoveryMode.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block if you have any unspent energy.

M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.NAME: Reflective Shell
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:Reroute.NAME: Reroute
M10Robot:Reroute.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL m10robot:Extract !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL When m10robot:Overclocked, increase its damage by !M10Robot:SecondMagic! this combat.

M10Robot:ReturningShield.NAME: Returning Shield
M10Robot:ReturningShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.
M10Robot:ReturningShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block and draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

M10Robot:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
M10Robot:Rewind.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first {!M!|@=time|>1=!M! times} you lose Block each turn, gain that much Block next turn.

M10Robot:RoboBeam.NAME: Robo Beam
M10Robot:RoboBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for every turn passed this combat.

M10Robot:Rushdown.NAME: Rush Down
M10Robot:Rushdown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Spiky. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:Salvo.NAME: Command
M10Robot:Salvo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb. NL If the enemy has Lock-On, m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:ScrambleField.NAME: Scramble Field
M10Robot:ScrambleField.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain X{!M!|>0= + !M!} Strength. NL ALL enemies lose NL X{!M!|>0= + !M!} Strength.

M10Robot:ScrapeOff.NAME: Scrape Off
M10Robot:ScrapeOff.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Spiky. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

M10Robot:Scrapper.NAME: Scrapper
M10Robot:Scrapper.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes.
M10Robot:Scrapper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next Orb. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Spikes for each m10robot:Upgrade it had plus !M!.

M10Robot:SecretRootkit.NAME: Rootkit
M10Robot:SecretRootkit.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Cards drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

M10Robot:Seeker.NAME: Seeker
M10Robot:Seeker.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On. NL If the enemy already had Lock-On, deal !D! damage.

M10Robot:SelfDestruction.NAME: Self Destruction
M10Robot:SelfDestruction.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Inert. NL Lose !M10Robot:SecondMagic! HP. NL m10robot:Stun the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:SpikyPlating.NAME: Spiky Plating
M10Robot:SpikyPlating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! m10robot:Spikes. NL Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Searchlights.

M10Robot:SplitBeam.NAME: Split Beam
M10Robot:SplitBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. When m10robot:Extracted, increase its hits by !M10Robot:SecondMagic! this combat.

M10Robot:StepUp.NAME: Step Up
M10Robot:StepUp.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. NL m10robot:Extract !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Overclock {!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|@=it|>1=them} !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:TargetingSystem.NAME: Heuristics
M10Robot:TargetingSystem.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel an Orb, apply !M! Lock-On to a random enemy.

M10Robot:HeatSeekers.NAME: Heat Seekers
M10Robot:HeatSeekers.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies with Lock-On.

M10Robot:ThornField.NAME: Thorn Field
M10Robot:ThornField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes for each enemy in combat.

M10Robot:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
M10Robot:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Swappable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL m10robot:Upgrade the next Orb you Channel !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:Support.NAME: Support
M10Robot:Support.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Inert. m10robot:Swappable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL m10robot:Overclock the next card you play !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:UnstableCompound.NAME: Unstable Compound
M10Robot:UnstableCompound.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M! m10robot:Bomb{!M!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Upgrade a random Orb !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:WaveGenerator.NAME: Wave Generator
M10Robot:WaveGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

M10Robot:WideAngle.NAME: Wide Angle
M10Robot:WideAngle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}When you play an Attack, m10robot:Bits now hit !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}. NL Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Bits.
